text:
💊 #COVID19 💊 #chloroquine 

🇺🇸 trial for prophylactic use of HCQ (#hydroxychloroquine) in #hcw and close contacts across the USA:

➡️ if you're accepted, HCQ shipped to you
➡️ DAY 1 - 1st dose 💊 4 tablets, 2nd dose 💊 3 tablets
➡️ DAYS 2-4 - take 💊 3 tablets each morning https://t.co/ba733Cd2W7
